inputs.text: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走

Traditional Chinese line drawing illustration style, black ink on aged paper texture, classical folklore narrative aesthetic, poignant farewell scene depicting sage's final departure and severance of earthly ties, upper portion featuring dramatic sky composition with contrasting decorative elements, left side solid black云纹 cloud formation in dense swirling ruyi patterns suggesting mortal earthly realm and domestic life being left behind, center-right lighter outlined云纹 clouds with flowing organic curves creating transition zone, far right distinctive bird motif possibly phoenix or crane rendered in bold black brushstrokes with dramatic wing spread and flowing tail feathers suggesting supernatural realm and destiny calling sage forward, entire sky composition visualizing transition from mundane to divine realm, middle register showing stylized mountain or landscape elements rendered in flowing curved lines creating sense of journey and distance, horizontal bands of organic patterns suggesting natural landscape sage must traverse to reach Xiqi, atmospheric depth created through layered curved forms, left side featuring decorative grapevine on ornate pole or post with small pavilion-style finial at top, vine extending downward with clusters of leaves framing scene, architectural element possibly representing home or domestic space being abandoned, scattered small objects or vessels on ground near vine suggesting household possessions left behind, center-left showing Ma Shi in elegant dark robes with geometric Greek key回纹 border patterns and circular floral medallions, wife holding divorce letter休书 document in both hands examining it with mixed expression, Ma Shi's posture upright and dignified showing she has gotten what she demanded, wife's facial expression complex mixing satisfaction at gaining independence with possible hint of uncertainty about future, Ma Shi's body language showing acceptance of document that formalizes separation, sense of woman who chose security and independence now holding proof of her choice, wife's robes flowing showing she stands firmly in decision, center showing Jiang Ziya in scholarly robes with contrasting dark and light garments, sage's characteristic rotund cheerful form now in gesture of farewell and release, Jiang Ziya's posture showing he has completed painful duty of writing divorce letter没办法 having no choice but to comply with wife's demand, one hand raised toward face in emotional gesture possibly wiping tears or showing sorrow, other hand positioned in releasing or farewell motion, sage's expression mixing sadness at personal loss with acceptance of necessity, sense of man severing last earthly attachment to fulfill cosmic destiny, Jiang Ziya's body turned slightly toward right beginning physical departure toward Xiqi, right side showing Song Yiren宋异人 Jiang Ziya's brother or friend in simple robes coming to bid farewell辞了仁兄宋异人, Song Yiren's concerned compassionate expression showing sympathy for sage's difficult situation, friend's posture leaning forward with both hands raised in gesture of farewell blessing or emotional support, one hand near face possibly wiping own tears at sad parting, other hand extended toward departing sage in gesture of reluctant goodbye, Song Yiren's robes featuring distinctive decorative bow or ornament suggesting personal touch of friendship, sense of loyal friend who understands sage's calling even while mourning separation, friend's body language showing he will not try to stop sage but grieves the parting, spatial arrangement showing three figures at moment of final separation, Ma Shi on left holding divorce document representing severed marriage, Jiang Ziya in center torn between past and future, Song Yiren on right representing friendship and earthly connections being left behind, ground level showing scattered small objects possibly birds or stones suggesting humble departure with minimal possessions, sense of sage一人离家去了西岐 leaving home alone for Xiqi carrying only his destiny, three figures creating triangle composition emphasizing diverging paths, wife staying behind with independence, friend staying behind with memories, sage departing alone toward cosmic calling, animated subtle movements showing Ma Shi examining document with complex emotions, Jiang Ziya's sorrowful gesture and turning movement beginning departure, Song Yiren's emotional farewell with hands raised in blessing, robes flowing with movement and breeze suggesting passage and change, sky elements seeming to pull sage forward toward supernatural destiny, vine and domestic elements anchoring left side to earthly realm being abandoned, monochromatic sepia tones with melancholic ink wash creating bittersweet atmosphere of necessary ending, vintage aged paper with historical weathering lending gravitas to life transformation, classical Chinese farewell departure illustration aesthetic emphasizing personal sacrifice required for cosmic destiny, masterpiece folkloric solitary journey beginning scene showing hero stripped of earthly attachments, 4k quality, legendary solo departure moment visualization, cosmic calling requiring complete severance as sage exchanges comfortable domestic life for uncertain supernatural adventure, tragic necessity as immortal destiny demands mortal sage abandon wife brother possessions and security to become heaven's chosen instrument traveling alone toward ultimate purpose in Xiqi where he will transform from failed official into legendary military strategist and defeater of tyrannical dynasty
